name: Relic from the past
description:
A relic of the past, left by our ancestors, so that we could truly appreciate the beautiful things in our universe. A peace gesture from a civil war that split us in two. A point by point recount of our glorious history. A treasure hunt for the most marvelous items has started, each day we seem to strive harder to be the land of wonders.

                   

                    -The planet where I live, is known as the most wonderful planet on the whole entire universe. It's weather, is perfect, the vegetation is incredible, and it's inhabitants have found some way to improve their lives, well maybe they've just been taking unfair advantage of the planet.

                    -I was born, to modern beings, human, beings that fight to survive. I've been searching for the whole of my life. Though that's not really true. This one event happened a few days back...`
